overview.en: Konomi Network (KONO) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Konomi Network has a current supply of 100,000,000 with 7,957,214.3999 in circulation. The last known price of Konomi Network is 3.44320613 USD and is down -9.94 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 2 active market(s) with $1,503,075.62 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://www.konomi.network/#/.
